title: Self-Doubt is Interfering With My Job
description:
Shawn is overweight and feels out of place in his job as an executive because his colleagues are typically attractive. - Dr. Laura: "Be proud that your success is based fully on your talent and abilities."

How important are looks in your workplace? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
